column4: i installed KDE "kubuntu" using synaptic...but now i want to remove it....remove all KDE from ubuntu completely...i tried just removing the files i installed "kubuntu-desktop" and "kubuntu-default-setting"...but KDE is still on my sistem....how can i remove it?
i installed skype and it works fine...but, why does the fonts in the program look huge? its like if the apperance doesnt match my desktop...how could i fix that?
it's a QT thing, last I remember.  anyone know the complement to gtk2-engines-gtk-qt ?
